title: Identifying Given Values
text: Identify the initial term, a1 and a2, which is given as part of the formula. This is the first and second term.

title: Finding Next Terms
text: To find the third term, a3, substitute the second term into the formula for an-1. Solve. Repeat until you have solved for the 8th term.

title: First 8 Terms of Sequence
text: What are the first 5 terms of the sequence?
